channel.title: ods-analysis on Codelibrary
channel.description: Recent content in ods-analysis on Codelibrary

item.title: ods-analysis, quick intro
item.description: The technical documentation says : This widget exposes the results of an analysis (as an object containing a results array and optionally an aggregations object) in a variable available in the scope. It can be used with AngularJS’s ngRepeat to simply build a table of analysis results. Normal people would say : Ods-analysis is the way to get the values behind a chart ! What you can do with a chart, you can do the same with ods-analysis.
